statement.p: What is the solution to \displaystyle{9}={5}{x}+{4}? Preview Question 1 Â

solution.p: \displaystyle{9}={5}{x}+{4}. We undo the \displaystyle+{4} by subtracting from both sides.
\displaystyle{5}={5}{x}. We undo the multiplication by \displaystyle{5} by dividing by \displaystyle{5} on both sides.
